fields.label: Page Reminder
fields.message: Remember to set the parent to this page in order for the "BACK: ..." link at the bottom of the page to work. The parent page should be the project's relevant page--e.g. Artwork and Artists, Public Programs.

sub_fields.label: Artwork and Artists Grid
sub_fields.message: No fields here as all content is added dynamically--all artwork and artists project pages that are children of this page

sub_fields.label: Events Grid
sub_fields.message: No fields here as all content is added dynamically--this section displays the next three events for the project selected
